messages.empty_stack: You have not told us your stack, get started with /add_stack ğŸ˜
messages.add_stack:
Enter the stacks you want to include to your profile separated by comma (,) or in newlines e.g python, react, css, rust

If you want to receive job postings for all stacks enter 'all' without quotes
